price: Na ikamsikiliza Mola wake Mlezi, na ikapasiwa kumsikiliza!
footnotes: Na ikamwelekea Mola wake Mlezi kwa kuzidi kutanuka kwake na kutoa vilio kuwemo ndani yake na kuachana navyo, na hayo ni haki yake kuwa. Yakitokea yote hayo yaliyo tangulia kusimuliwa basi kila mtu atapata malipo ya vitendo vyake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
